### Click the button to generate an excuse:

<button onclick="generateExcuse()">

Generate Excuse

</button>

::: {#excuse style="margin-top:20px; font-weight:bold; text-align:center;color:red;"}
:::

```{=html}
<script>
  // List of excuses
  const excuses = [
    "I overslept and was late.",
    "Traffic was terrible.",
    "My dog ate my homework.",
    "I completely forgot.",
    "I had to help a friend in an emergency.",
    "My cat hid my keys.",
  "Aliens abducted me for a short while.",
  "I was busy negotiating peace between two squirrels.",
  "I had to rescue a pancake from burning.",
  "I couldnâ€™t buy my coffee this morning."
  ];

  function generateExcuse() {
    const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * excuses.length);
    document.getElementById("excuse").innerText = excuses[randomIndex];
  }
</script>
```
